attributes.action: Re-open all Health suites within Glasgow City Council
attributes.additional_details: With mental health issues on a record high glasgow city council have decided to close all health suites within there leisure centres this includes sauna steamrooms and jacuzzi facilities,  this is not only a meeting place for both male and female groups to meet up and chat but also to maintain there mental health and relax using the above mentioned to decrease anxiety stress etc but also continue many health benefits they promote including weight loss and many other health issues people suffer.
attributes.background: I want all Health suites to be re-opened within Glasgow City Council leisure facilities to mantain positive mental health and well being.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local facilities are a matter for Glasgow City Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can petition your local council - you can find out more here:
https://www.glasgow.gov.uk/index.aspx?articleid=17716
